arts.ttl: European football: Barcola extends PSG’s perfect start but injuries mar Lens win
arts.sum: Ethan Mbappé, Kylian’s brother, scores Lille’s winner Werder Bremen hit four past Borussia Mönchengladbach Paris Saint-Germain extended their perfect start to Ligue 1 with a fourth straight win by beating Lens 2-0. But the victory was overshadowed by more injuries ahead of their midweek Champions League opener. PSG, who host Atalanta on Wednesday, were already without the forwards Ousmane Dembélé and Désiré Doué, and finished the game with more players sidelined. The European champions were in control at Parc des Princes but Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, Lee Kang-in and Lucas Beraldo were all forced to leave the field with injuries. This story will be updated Continue reading...

arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens (2-0) highlights, Barcola double and wave of injuries
arts.sum: Watch below the video highlights of PSG vs. Lens, featuring Bradley Barcola’s goals. Paris Saint-Germain, after a relatively controlled match despite a few shaky moments, won 2-0 at the Parc des Princes against Lens on Matchday 4 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 this Sunday. This came despite injuries to Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, Lee Kang-In, and Lucas Beraldo. […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – The Parisians’ ratings: Barcola and Vitinha in control
arts.sum: This Sunday, on Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain faced Lens at the Parc des Princes. After a match where the Red and Blue dominated without being perfect, they won 2-0. Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (6) – A slight miscue with Lucas Beraldo early […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – Another injured man in Paris, it looks serious
arts.sum: After Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (24-year-old forward) and Lee Kang-In (24-year-old midfielder/forward), another Paris Saint-Germain player has joined Désiré Doué (20-year-old midfielder/forward) and Ousmane Dembélé (28-year-old forward) on the injured list. Lucas Beraldo (21-year-old defender) also went off during the match against Lens (Matchday 4 of Ligue 1). And the injury appears to be serious. The Brazilian, […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – The carnage continues in Paris after Kvaratskhelia!
arts.sum: Lee Kang-in, 24-year-old Paris Saint-Germain midfielder/forward, was substituted in the 57th minute of Sunday afternoon’s match against Lens (Matchday 4 of Ligue 1), despite starting the game. This was due to what appears to be an ankle injury, although the cause and severity are unclear. He was replaced by Senny Mayulu (19-year-old attacking midfielder). This […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – Another Parisian striker injured!
arts.sum: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, 24-year-old Paris Saint-Germain striker, played only 29 minutes in Sunday’s match against Lens (Matchday 4 of Ligue 1), despite starting. This was due to a nasty knock to his calf. He was replaced by 17-year-old striker Ibrahim Mbaye. This is another blow for PSG, who have already lost Désiré Doué (20) and Ousmane […]

arts.ttl: PSG/Lens – Preview of the Lens team: a new era, but still an attacking side
arts.sum: This Sunday, September 14, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lens (5th) at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 5:15 PM, CET) during matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: Lens predicted XI v PSG: Odsonne Édouard could debut against former team
arts.sum: RC Lens travel to the Parc des Princes to face a Paris Saint-Germain side suffering a hangover from the international break, with Ousmane Dembélé and Désiré Doué both ruled out…
